comment.author: 95731483@N02
comment._content: P-51D-5-NT 44-11280, tail number 600. This airplane was presented to 118th TRS CO,  LtCol Edward O. McComas, personally by MajGen Claire Chennault on Dec. 25, 1944 in recognition of McComas' accomplishments on the Dec. 23rd fighter mission. On Dec 23rd LtCol McComas, flying his F-6C Mustang, shot down five japanese airplanes over Hankow-Muchang, China to become the only Ace in a day in the 14th Air Force. On the next day he shot down another Japanese airplane bringing his total to 14 deatroyed in the air, 4 on the ground and 1 Japanese destroyer sunk in Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong. He was the 4th highest scoring ace in the 14th AF.
